alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Upper Rio Grande Valley, Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 2:45PM MST until January 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SUNDAY TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 11 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Upper Rio Grande Valley/Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Feet and Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Feet. * WHEN...From 11 AM Sunday to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Upper Rio Grande Valley, Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Ft
